questions.question_text: You plan to configure OTV multicast. What must you enable to use SSM?

discussion.content:
Configuring OTV on a Single Edge Device (Multicast Mode)
a. Configure the join-interface (in this example a Layer 3 physical interface):

 OTV-VDC-A(config)# interface ethernet 2/2
 OTV-VDC-A(config-if)# description [ OTV Join-Interface ]
 OTV-VDC-A(config-if)# ip address 172.26.255.98/30
 OTV-VDC-A(config-if)# ip igmp version 3
 OTV-VDC-A(config-if)# no shutdown

questions.question_text: Which two options are supported on Cisco UCS Fabric Interconnects that use native Fibre Channel connectivity? (Choose two.)

choices.D: The Fabric Interconnect uses L1-L2 links to forward data when the primary Fabric Interconnect uplinks are down.
choices.B: The Fabric Interconnect cluster uses a Cisco UCS B-Series Blade Server chassis to forward data when the L1-L2 links are down.
choices.C: The Fabric Interconnect cluster uses a virtual IP address for management connections.
choices.A: Only the active Fabric Interconnect forwards data traffic.
choices.E: When the primary Fabric Interconnect node comes up after a failure, the node compares the Cisco UCS system database version to the standby Fabric

questions.question_text: Which two statements accurately describe a Cisco UCS Fabric Interconnect cluster? (Choose two.)
Which statement describes an interconnect link between an FCoE NPV switch and an FCF switch?

choices.A: The interconnect must use port type NP on the FCoE switch.
choices.D: The FCoE switch must create the tunnel interface and bind to the physical interconnect.
choices.B: The interconnect must use port type VNP on the FCoE switch.
choices.C: The interconnect must use port type E on the FCoE switch.

questions.question_text: You plan to extend the Layer 2 domain by using OTV in multicast mode. What must you consider?

discussion.content:
confirmed B is correct
"Note the configuration of IGMPv3 on the join-interface. This allows OTV to join the SSM groups of the transport/core network needed to extend the sites' multicast traffic.

choices.D: The site OTV VLAN must be the same on all of the AED routers on all of the sites.
choices.B: The join interface must run IGMPv3.
choices.C: The OTV site VLAN must be extended over the overlay.
choices.A: The same site ID must be used on all of the edge devices on all of the sites.
